input.sentences: as she got ready | she thought of how hard she worked for this day .
the graduates marched in the auditorium .
she was proud of what she had accomplished .
output.sentences: The student got ready for a hard day.
She marched with the other graduates in the auditorium.
There were many speeches by faculty at the event.
The audience listened intently to the speeches.
The student was very proud of what she had accomplished.
